text: wend allah -jl wela- mafatih alghayb ay: khazayin alghyb, la yaelamuha 'iilaa hw, wmnha: eilm alsaet, wnzwl alghyth, wama fi alarham, walksb fi almstqbl, wmkan mwt al'insan, wayaelam kula ma fi albari walbhr, wama tasqut min waraqat min nbtt 'iilaa yelmha, fkl habat fi khafaya alard, wakulu ratb wyabs, mthbt fi kitab wadih la labs fyh, wahu allwh almhfwz
